title: Catalytic combustion of biodiesel wastewater over the Fe2O3 catalyst coupled with a Pt-based catalyst
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EW00259H, Paper
Shangzhi Yu, Wenyu Yuan, Jianfeng Bai, Qinglong Xie, Xiaojiang Liang, Yong Nie
Continuous and efficient catalytic combustion of biodiesel wastewater with high chemical oxygen demand and sulfur content can be achieved by the Fe2O3 catalyst coupled with the Pt/Al2O3@cordierite catalyst.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
